page.title: 14A vicar's wife,Stevenage.
page.content: { St.Nicholas Church}celebrated its 850th birthday this year by old cus- toms such as{Beating the Bounds,}old games, competitions and a barn dance. There were booklets about the church for sale at the fete and at the car boot sale held at Almond Hill School. Mr.and Mrs.Weston came here 15 years ago from Rotherham.Mrs.Weston enjoys going to a really old church.The altar pleases her most.Since she has been here these improvements have been made _part of the{church}has been made into a parish room,new lead has been put on the steeple,a new church roof,decorat- ing and new heating. Mrs.Weston has made a lot of friends at the church,but worship is more important;she likes communion best.Her duties are as{vicar's}secretary,church cleaning,flower-arranging,visiting sick people and welcoming new ones.
